name: Life of Thife
description:
Game Overview:
Survive each day as an unsuspecting bandit and
Thief simulation game to collect the necessary resources

Procuring Supplies:
Necessary supplies are procured from the city!
Check items and containers that are randomly placed for each search.
Bring back the materials you need.

Eyes of the Guards and Citizens:
You are an inquirer and are watched by guards and citizens.
Guards will chase you when they find you.
If you fail to escape and are caught, they will confiscate the items you have collected during your search.
Citizens will also report you to the patrolling guards when they find you.
